name: TriggerVolume
desc: An invisible 3D shape that detects when objects enter or exit a given region of space.

items.name: init(shape: ShapeResource, filter: CollisionFilter)
items.desc: Creates a trigger volume with the given shape and collision filter.

items.name: init(shapes: [ShapeResource], filter: CollisionFilter)
items.desc: Creates a trigger volume with the given composite shape and collision filter.

items.name: var collision: CollisionComponent?
items.desc: The collision component that gives the entity the ability to participate in collision simulations.

items.name: struct CollisionComponent
items.desc: A component that gives an entity the ability to collide with other entities that also have collision components.

items.name: struct SynchronizationComponent
items.desc: A component that synchronizes an entity between processes and networked applications.
